0.2.0.name: wordpress/wp-tracklink
0.2.0.description: • Tracks referrer links plus how often they have clicked and displays them on your Wordpress widget sidebar. This will increase your page ranking due to backlink. Most clicked links gets an higher position in sidebar. Disabling specific links is possible via the settings tab. Visit official site at http://ispire.me/wp-tracklink for more infos.
